image.alt: Smiling patients in a modern orthodontic office at Orthobar

paragraphs.text: Welcome to the Orthobar family — a privately owned, doctor‑run orthodontic practice in Las Vegas that treats every patient like family. Our board‑certified orthodontic specialists deliver personalized treatment plans using cutting‑edge technology (Damon Ultima, Spark, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and more) to prioritize comfort, efficiency, and long‑term results.

Patients see the same owner‑doctor at each visit so care is consistent and relationship‑driven. Our modern office and flexible financing make advanced orthodontics accessible for kids, teens, and adults alike.

items.title: Owner‑Doctor Care

image.alt: Orthodontist meeting patient

items.text: Direct care from the owners for consistent, personalized treatment and stronger patient relationships.

items.title: Advanced Technology

image.alt: Digital orthodontic scanning and aligner planning

items.text: Digital scans and modern systems like Damon Ultima, Spark, and clear aligners for fewer visits and improved comfort.

items.title: Patient‑First Practice

image.alt: Family-friendly orthodontic office environment

items.text: Privately owned, community‑focused care with complimentary first consultations and a team that treats you like family.

items.title: Flexible Payments

image.alt: Flexible payment options and financing

items.text: Affordable financing and insurance assistance to make treatment manageable for families.

paragraphs.text: Meet Dr. Brady Petersen, DMD, MS, a Las Vegas native and board‑certified orthodontist at Orthobar. Dr. Petersen earned his Bachelor of Science in Exercise Physiology (minor in Chemistry) at the University of Utah, completed dental school at UNLV School of Dental Medicine where he was inducted into Omicron Kappa Upsilon, and later finished advanced specialty training in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics at UNLV, earning a Master’s in Oral Biology. He is ABO board‑certified and known for combining technical expertise with compassionate, family‑focused care.

image.alt: Dr. Brady Petersen, orthodontist at Orthobar

paragraphs.text: Meet Dr. Kory Grahl, DMD, MS, FAGD, a Kois‑recognized specialist and ABO‑certified orthodontist at Orthobar. Dr. Grahl graduated summa cum laude with a degree in Biology and completed his DMD at UNLV before advanced specialty training in orthodontics and a Master’s in Oral Biology at UNLV. He is a Fellow of the Academy of General Dentistry and brings advanced training in esthetic and complex care to our practice.

image.alt: Dr. Kory Grahl, orthodontist at Orthobar

paragraphs.text: From discreet clear aligners to advanced Damon Ultima braces and surgical orthodontics, we offer modern options tailored to each patient’s goals.

image.alt: Clear aligners like Invisalign and Spark for discreet orthodontic treatment
Damon Ultima and metal braces for efficient tooth movement
Aesthetic clear ceramic brackets for less noticeable braces
Surgical orthodontics and adjunctive in‑office procedures for complex cases

og_meta.title: Home - Orthobar
og_meta.description: Owner‑run orthodontic care in Las Vegas with personalized plans, advanced technology, and flexible financing.

image.alt: Welcoming orthodontic team at Orthobar, bright modern office reception

paragraphs.text: Community is at the core of what we do at Orthobar. You are more than just a patient when you choose us as your orthodontist — you become part of the Orthobar family. We combine the latest technology with expert orthodontic knowledge to craft broad, harmonious smiles tailored to each person.

Every smile is unique, so we create individualized treatment plans that fit your lifestyle, needs, and goals. Whether you’re interested in braces, clear aligners, or another orthodontic option, our team focuses on comfort, convenience, and long-term oral health.

We emphasize gentle techniques, clear communication, and flexible scheduling so orthodontic care is accessible to families across Las Vegas. Our practice is privately owned, and you’ll receive hands-on care from experienced specialists who treat each patient like family.
Ready to get started? Schedule a consultation: https://orthobar.com/contact-us/

image.alt: Dr. Brady Petersen headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Brady Petersen, DMD, MS, is a board-certified orthodontic specialist and one of the owners at Orthobar. A Las Vegas native, he provides personalized treatment plans and hands-on care, focusing on clinical excellence and patient comfort. Patients benefit from his advanced training in orthodontics and commitment to long-term results.

image.alt: Dr. Brady Petersen smiling in clinic

paragraphs.text: Dr. Petersen completed his undergraduate studies at the University of Utah, earning a Bachelor of Science in Exercise Physiology with a minor in Chemistry. He earned his Doctor of Dental Medicine (DMD) from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas School of Dental Medicine and completed an advanced postdoctoral specialty program in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics at UNLV-SDM, where he also earned a Master’s degree in Oral Biology.

He has completed the requirements for and holds certification from the American Board of Orthodontics and is an active participant in professional organizations that support high standards of orthodontic care.

image.alt: Dr. Brady Petersen professional portrait

paragraphs.text: Outside the office, Dr. Petersen enjoys family life in Las Vegas with his wife Nicole and their four children. He values community involvement and brings that same sense of care to his practice, treating patients with the attention and respect he would give to family members.

image.alt: Dr. Petersen with family
Dr. Kory Grahl headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Kory Grahl, DMD, MS, FAGD, is a Kois-recognized orthodontic specialist with a strong background in both general dentistry and specialty orthodontics. He blends clinical experience with advanced training to design treatment plans that prioritize function, facial balance, and long-term stability.

image.alt: Dr. Kory Grahl smiling in office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Grahl graduated summa cum laude from Western New England University with a Bachelor’s degree in Biology and minors in Chemistry and Forensic Science. He earned his Doctorate of Dental Medicine at the University of Nevada, Las Vegas School of Dental Medicine and completed specialty training in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics at UNLV-SDM, where he also earned a Master’s degree in Oral Biology.

He is a Fellow of the Academy of General Dentistry (FAGD), a Kois-recognized specialist, and has achieved certification from the American Board of Orthodontics. His education includes focused research on bracket design and ongoing engagement with advanced clinical programs.

image.alt: Dr. Grahl professional portrait

paragraphs.text: When he’s not treating patients, Dr. Grahl enjoys family life with his wife Rachael and their children. He stays active through strength training, coaching youth sports, and continuing education that advances clinical care for his patients.

image.alt: Dr. Grahl with family

Learn more about our community programs and download our outreach guide: https://orthobar.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/7-Features-Final.pdf

og_meta.title: About Us | Orthobar
og_meta.description: Learn about Orthobar's mission to provide patient-focused orthodontic care in Las Vegas with experienced, board-certified specialists.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at the front desk of an orthodontic practice

paragraphs.text: Your first visit starts with a complimentary consultation. You’ll meet our team, discuss goals, and we’ll perform a focused exam with any needed images to recommend the best treatment for your smile.
We’ll review your medical history, explain options like Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and braces, and go over insurance and financing so you leave with a clear plan and next steps.

image.alt: Parent and child checking in at a dental reception desk

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically to make your visit easy and stress-free.
Flexible payment options and in-house financing are available, and our treatment coordinator will help you find a plan that fits your budget.

image.alt: Family enjoying time together at Orthobar

seo.page_description: Schedule a complimentary consultation at Orthobar in Las Vegas. Find our address, patient forms, and details to get started with orthodontic care.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, complimentary consultation, Las Vegas, Orthobar, patient forms

og_meta.title: Get Started | Orthobar
og_meta.description: Schedule a complimentary consultation at Orthobar in Las Vegas. Find our address, patient forms, and details to get started with orthodontic care.

image.alt: Patient smiling during an orthodontic consultation at Orthobar

paragraphs.text: Damon Ultima braces move teeth efficiently with comfortable, low‑friction mechanics. We choose them for many teens and adults who want powerful results with fewer adjustments.

image.alt: Two young women taking a selfie while smiling after orthodontic treatment

paragraphs.text: Symetri clear braces blend with your teeth for a more aesthetic look while handling complex movements. They offer broad arches and predictable alignment for patients who want discreet fixed appliance care.
Clear bracket material gives a low‑profile, tooth‑colored appearance while delivering the same arch development and control as metal systems.

image.alt: Close-up of clear braces on a dental model

accordion.header: How to Care for Clear Braces

paragraphs.text: Avoid hard or sticky foods, brush thoroughly, use interdental tools, and keep scheduled checkups to preserve aesthetics and treatment progress.

image.alt: Toothbrush rinsing under sink water, illustrating brace care
Orthodontic clinician placing clear braces during treatment

paragraphs.text: Spark aligners deliver predictable, braces‑like results with removable, virtually invisible trays. Typical treatment runs six to eighteen months with a focus on convenience and comfort.

image.alt: Woman smiling while putting on her clear aligners

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> uses custom clear trays and 3D planning to move teeth precisely while letting you eat and brush normally. It’s a discreet option for many adult and teen patients.

image.alt: Woman placing clear Invisalign aligners

paragraphs.text: For skeletal or severe bite issues, we coordinate surgical and orthodontic care. Our approach includes pre‑surgical planning, collaboration with oral surgeons, and careful post‑surgical orthodontic finishing.
We use precise surgical lasers to adjust gum contours, improving smile balance with minimal discomfort.

image.alt: Before and after of a patient treated with laser gingivectomy

paragraphs.text: TADs provide a stable, temporary anchor in the jaw to enable precise tooth movement for complex cases.

image.alt: Dental model showing temporary anchorage devices

paragraphs.text: MARPE expands the dental arch without major palatal surgery, useful for select teens and adults.

image.alt: Teeth with a mini‑screw assisted rapid palatal expansion appliance
Surgical orthodontics treatment room

paragraphs.text: Adults benefit from tailored treatment plans that combine digital diagnostics and comfortable appliance options. We offer complimentary consultations and a digital bite assessment to plan efficient, low‑disruption care.

image.alt: Smiling adult patient after orthodontic treatment

paragraphs.text: Teen care includes full exams with 3D imaging and a choice of Damon Ultima, clear braces, or aligners. We aim to keep treatment comfortable and confidence high.

image.alt: Teen checking their teeth in a mirror at the orthodontist

paragraphs.text: Early exams focus on arch development and prevention. Options include habit interventions, space maintainers, palate expanders, and Invisalign First when appropriate.

image.alt: Young boy smiling at his orthodontist before treatment
Family enjoying time together at Orthobar

og_meta.title: Contact Orthobar | Las Vegas Orthodontist
og_meta.description: Contact Orthobar in Las Vegas to schedule a complimentary consultation. Call (702) 757-5355 or email smile@orthobar.com.

image.alt: Orthodontic practice reception with welcoming branding

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about orthodontic treatments, scheduling, and payment options at Orthobar.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional metal and ceramic braces, clear aligners including Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, and modern systems such as Damon braces and Spark aligners to meet a range of treatment needs.

image.alt: Happy family portrait in a bright orthodontic office

accordion.header: How do clear aligners differ from braces?

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners are removable and discreet, making them a popular choice for adults and teens. Braces are fixed and can be better for complex tooth movements. During your consultation we'll recommend the best option for your goals.

image.alt: Couple enjoying time together at an orthodontic clinic

accordion.header: What is Damon and Spark technology?

paragraphs.text: Damon is a self-ligating braces system designed for efficient tooth movement and patient comfort. Spark aligners are a clear aligner brand that focuses on aesthetics and a comfortable fit.

image.alt: Orthodontic team collaborating in a modern office

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: We recommend an orthodontic evaluation by age 7 so we can monitor growth and development and plan treatment if and when it becomes necessary.

image.alt: Smiling man working at a desk in a bright clinic

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment time depends on the complexity of your case. Many patients complete active care in 12 to 24 months. We'll provide a personalized timeline at your initial appointment.

image.alt: Mother and daughter smiling together at the clinic

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment options. Our team will review your benefits and available financing during your visit.

image.alt: Patient discussing insurance and financing at a desk

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Request an appointment using our online form at https://orthobar.com/contact-us/. Visit the Contact page to send a message and view current contact options.

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic braces in a clinic reception area

accordion.header: Do you use a contact form and reCAPTCHA?

paragraphs.text: Yes. Our site contact form includes reCAPTCHA to protect submissions. When you use the form you may see links to Google's privacy policy and terms during submission.

image.alt: Clinic contact area and staff ready to assist with appointments

accordion.header: What should I expect after treatment and with retainers?

paragraphs.text: After active treatment you'll receive retainers to help maintain your smile. We'll explain the type of retainer, wear schedule, and care instructions during your final visits.

image.alt: Orthodontic team explaining aftercare to a patient

accordion.header: What do I do in a dental emergency or if my appliance breaks?

paragraphs.text: For severe pain, swelling, or a broken appliance contact us promptly through the Contact page. For minor issues we can often provide phone guidance or schedule a quick repair visit.

image.alt: Orthodontic emergency kit and office ready to assist
Family enjoying time together at Orthobar
